item.title: Asia Plantation Capital is researching the advantages of agarwood
item.description:
Source: Asia Plantation Capital website. Asia Plantation Capital (APC) has initiated a new investment program to collaborate with Southeast Asian academics in studying the science of agarwood, a valuable substance derived from infected Aquilaria trees and known by various names like gaharu, jinkoh, aloeswood, and oud. The program aims to pinpoint areas for in-depth research and potential clinical trials to gain approval from European and American medical authorities. In Thailand, APC’s partnership with Prince Songkhla University, led by Prof...
